skills.title: Small Business Websites
skills.description: Empower your small business with a professional and responsive website tailored to your unique needs. From design to launch, I create user-friendly sites that help you connect with customers and grow your brand.

skills.title: Single Page Websites
skills.description: Create an impact with a single-page website that captures attention and delivers key information fast. I design responsive, appealing single-page sites that highlight your brand's essence. I'll ensure your site is both engaging and effective.

skills.title: Website Maintenance
skills.description: Keep your website fresh and engaging with comprehensive maintenance services. I handle copy and image updates, design changes, and debugging to ensure your site remains attractive, functional, and up-to-date.

skills.title: Website Design
skills.description: Elevate your brand's online presence with custom web design that captivates. I create visually stunning, websites that reflect your unique brand identity. Every element is carefully crafted to engage your audience and drive business growth.

graphics.title: Black Friday Social Media Graphic
graphics.description: An eye-catching Black Friday graphic created to highlight major sales and promotions. Designed for maximum engagement, it combines dark tones with bold call-to-action elements for an impactful online presence.

graphics.title: Promotional Graphic for Cleaning Services
graphics.description: A vibrant and engaging promotional graphic for cleaning services, highlighting a limited-time offer with a clean design and pastel color palette. Ideal for social media marketing to attract new customers and promote service discounts.

graphics.title: Cyber Monday Sale
graphics.description: A bold and dynamic Cyber Monday sale graphic designed to boost online sales. Featuring attention-grabbing typography and a sleek layout, this graphic is tailored for driving traffic during the holiday shopping season.

videos.title: Tech Summit Promo: with Sound Effects
videos.description: A high-energy promotional video for a tech summit, featuring creative wall-scrolling visuals and dynamic sound effects. Designed to captivate audiences and drive interest in the event.

videos.title: Creative TikTok Intro with Body Double Effect
videos.description: An engaging and dynamic TikTok intro featuring a seamless body double effect. This video highlights editing skills, creativity, and the ability to produce captivating short-form content for social media.

videos.title: Humorous Tech Skit: Me and My Laptop
videos.description: A lighthearted and relatable tech skit featuring a playful interaction between me and my laptop. Designed to showcase creativity and humor, perfect for engaging tech audiences on social media.
